items.content_html: wc-hash-router is a lightweight and versatile hash-based router library designed specifically for web components. Empower your web applications with seamless navigation and dynamic content loading, all while maintaining clean and modular code with the power of web components.

items.content_html: A simple Dad jokes API built with Node.js and Express. This repository provides a lightweight web server that serves random dad jokes upon request. The API endpoint /api/jokes delivers a delightful dose of dad humor with each call. Get ready for some cheesy laughs! ü§£ #NodeJS #Express #DadJokesAPI

The API endpoint /api/jokes delivers a delightful dose of dad humor with each call. Get ready for some cheesy laughs! ü§£ #NodeJS #Express #DadJokesAPI

items.content_html: TypeSwift is a lightweight and user-friendly text expander tool that aims to enhance your typing experience. It allows you to create and utilize custom keyboard shortcuts for frequently used phrases and expressions, significantly reducing your typing time and effort.
